hero.title: About: process over stories
hero.subtitle: FxLocus is built around one belief: you don’t rise to your goals, you fall to your process. We focus on trading psychology, market understanding, and price action—not as slogans, but as a closed training loop you can repeat and audit. The work emphasizes clarity, falsification, risk boundaries, and reviewable behavior rather than persuasive narratives or performance hype.
highlights: A training-first brand: outputs and reviews come before tactics.
A closed loop: perception → execution → review → iteration.
A clear boundary: education only, no investment advice.
hero.risk: Educational content only. Not investment advice; trading involves risk.

title: About

sections.stanceBody: I’m against indicator worship and signal dependency. Your ceiling is defined by perception, disciplined execution, and a review loop.
sections.methodBody: Mind, Market, and Price Action—built into a training path with deliverables and audit criteria.
